verse_text: These things the Lord God has revealed to me. And behold, the locust was formed at the beginning of the germination during the latter rains, and behold, the latter rains came after the thundering of the king
And it happened, when they had finally eaten all the grass in the land, that I said, â€œLord God, be gracious, I beg you. Who will raise up Jacob, for he is little?
The Lord has been merciful about this. â€œIt will not be,â€ said the Lord
These things the Lord God has revealed to me. And behold, the Lord God called for judgment unto fire, and it devoured the manifold abyss, and it consumed simultaneously in every direction
And I said, â€œLord God, cease, I beg you. Who will raise up Jacob, for he is little?
The Lord has been merciful about this. â€œAnd even this will not be,â€ said the Lord God
These things the Lord revealed to me. And behold, the Lord was standing near a plastered wall, and in his hand was a masonâ€™s trowel

And the Lord said to me, â€œWhat do you see, Amos?â€ And I said, â€œA masonâ€™s trowel.â€ And the Lord said, â€œBehold, I will place the trowel in the midst of my people Israel. I will no longer plaster over them
And the heights of the idol will be demolished, and the sanctuaries of Israel will be desolate. And I will rise up against the house of Jeroboam with the sword.
And Amaziah, the priest of Bethel, sent to Jeroboam king of Israel, saying: â€œAmos has rebelled against you in the midst of the house of Israel. The land is not able to withstand all his sermons
For Amos says this: â€˜Jeroboam will die by the sword, and Israel will be taken captive out of their own land.â€™Â
And Amaziah said to Amos, â€œYou, seer, go out and flee into the land of Judah, and eat bread there, and prophesy there
And in Bethel, do not prophesy any longer, because it is the kingâ€™s sanctuary, and it is the house of the kingdom.
And Amos responded, and he said to Amasias, â€œI am not a prophet, and I am not the son of a prophet, but I am a herdsman plucking from wild fig trees
And the Lord took me, when I was following the flock, and the Lord said to me, â€˜Go, prophesy to my people Israel.â€™Â
And now, hear the word of the Lord: You say, â€œYou will not prophesy about Israel, and you will not rain your words upon the house of the idol.

Because of that, the Lord says this: â€œYour wife will fornicate in the city, and your sons and your daughters will fall by the sword, and your soil will be measured with a string. And you will die on polluted land, and Israel will be taken into captivity out of their land.
